QuestData.Title: Stalking the Stalkers
QuestData.Description: Many brave trolls have been lost to the harsh wilds of the Hinterlands, $r. The Silvermane wolves are one of the biggest threats to our hunters. They lay in wait, hiding amongst the bushes and landscape, then strike out when the opportunity presents itself.$B$BThis type of ferocity will not go unchecked!$B$BYou must think like the Silvermane. Stalk the stalkers! Slay them all!
QuestData.CompletionText: Show them the might of Revantusk!
QuestData.RewardText: A job well done, $r. The Revantusk thank you for your contribution.
